title: DbtModel
description: This schema defines the DbtModel entity. A DbtModel organizes data modeling details , sql and columns

dbtNodeType.description: This schema defines the type used for describing different types of Nodes in DBT.

dbtCatalogType.description: This schema defines the type used for describing different catalog type.

dbtMaterializationType.description: This schema defines the type used for describing different materialization type.

dbtModelName.description: Local name (not fully qualified name) of a table.

fullyQualifiedColumnName.description: Fully qualified name of the column that includes `serviceName.databaseName.tableName.columnName[.nestedColumnName]`. When columnName is null for dataType struct fields, `field_#` where `#` is field index is used. For map dataType, for key the field name `key` is used and for the value field `value` is used.

id.description: Unique identifier of this model instance.

name.description: Name of a model. Expected to be unique within a database.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this model. It could be title or label from the source services.

fullyQualifiedName.description: Fully qualified name of a model in the form `serviceName.databaseName.dbtModelName`.

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the entity.

database.description: Reference to Database that uses this DBT Model.

changeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.
